name: Ambush (FND Studios)
description:
They told you that you would be The One who would change the course of The War...

Ambush is a Short Game about the men who were sent to fight in Vietnam. Due to poor logistics, it was developed in three days for the Blackthornprod Game Jam. We hope that you like it!



FND Studios is a brazillian group of friends who met eachother at High School and became quite addict to game-making. We do our best to deliver a cool experience within our limitations.
